definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Results Food-poisoning accidents happen more frequently in the third quarter.
sentences.chinese: 結果食物中毒事故第三季度高發。

sentences.english: Objective To find out the cause of food-poisoning on a passenger train .
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解旅客列車上發生食物中毒的原因。

sentences.english: Propolis may help treat food poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 蜂膠或有助於防範食物中毒。

sentences.english: Salmonella is the most common bacterial form of food poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 沙門氏菌是一種最普遍的引起食物中毒的病菌。

sentences.english: “I thought I had food poisoning,” she recalls.
sentences.chinese: “我本以爲是食物中毒”，她回憶道。

sentences.english: Vibrio parahaemolyticus is an important microorganism pathogen for food intoxication cases.
sentences.chinese: 副溶血性弧菌是食物中毒的重要病原菌。

sentences.english: The food-poisoning case was caused by the consumption of ducks infected with the bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 食物中毒是由於食用帶菌鴨子所致。

sentences.english: An antidote against snake-bites, malaria, food poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 蛇咬，瘧疾，食物中毒的解毒藥。

sentences.english: But don't forget, reheating rice can lead to food poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 但不要忘記，重複加熱米飯可能導致食物中毒。

sentences.english: Bacteria-induced food poisoning was the main cause of most of the cases.
sentences.chinese: 細菌感染食物中毒是大部分病例的主要原因。

sentences.english: The villagers are lack of the knowledge of food poisoning prevention.
sentences.chinese: 結論威州鎮的食物中毒防治現狀亟待改善。

sentences.english: It is humiliating before others to have a diarrhoea ptomaine poisoning or to vomit from it.
sentences.chinese: 由於食物中毒而腹瀉或者嘔吐，是在別人面前丟臉。

sentences.english: Results The poison was caused from Type B paratyphoid salmonella bacillus of the pig meat.
sentences.chinese: 結果豬頭肉中的乙型副傷寒沙門氏菌引起食物中毒。

sentences.english: Five hours later I go to the hospital with food-poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 五個小時之後我因爲食物中毒被送到醫院。

sentences.english: Food poisoning is a notifiable disease in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 食物中毒是一個須呈報的疾病，在英國。

sentences.english: Watch out because if you eat one, you'll get food poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 需要注意的是不要誤食這種蛙而引起食物中毒。

definition: to get sick because of bad food
